content: {A思考星光}Perhaps I should devote a full page of my thesis to Glenn. Specifically, to the mystery of how he always manages to pull out exactly what I want to buy from the same old boxes.
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-邀约玩法-在格连商店-1005幻雪_邀约

content: I'm not very good at calculations, so I like to pay for things one at a time. {A笑眯眯}That way I don't have to add up the total, right?
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-邀约玩法-在格连商店-1005幻雪_邀约

content: Every time I finish counting and hand over the money, {A豆豆眼}Glenn just gives half of it back...{短暂停} Is today some sort of special discount day?
